name: AzureImageBuilderTask
description: Build images using Azure Image Builder resource provider.
author: Microsoft Corporation

groups.name: ImageBuilderInput
groups.displayName: Where you want to run this template

inputs.name: imageSource
inputs.label: Image type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select image source for Azure Image Builder.
Supported source: Managed Image, Shared Image Gallery and Marketplace.

inputs.name: customImageResourceId
inputs.label: Image resource id for Managed Image
inputs.helpMarkDown:
ResourceId string for Managed Image. Managed image and template locations must be same.

Example, /subscriptions/subscription_id/resourceGroups/rg_name/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/image_name

inputs.name: ImageVersionId
inputs.label: Image version id
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Image verison id for Shared Image Gallery source image. Shared image location and template location must be same.

Example, /subscriptions/subscription_id/resourceGroups/rg_name/providers/Microsoft.Compute/galleries/gallery_name/images/image_definition_name/versions/version_name

inputs.name: baseImage
inputs.label: Base image
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can choose from a curated gallery of OS images. Latest version will be used for these platform images.

inputs.name: provisioner
inputs.label: Provisioner
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select provisioner. Shell is for Linux and Powershell is for windows.

inputs.name: packagePath
inputs.label: Build path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select build artifact path using file selection widget. This path is where build artifacts reside and must be a directory for this task. It is relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: inlineScript
inputs.label: Inline customization script
inputs.defaultValue:
# add commands to move build files from temporary to persistent location for linux
# this can be an array of commands
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Inline script to move build files from temporary to persistent location and to add other customizations to the image.

Artifact directory on: 
 Linux is /tmp/build_path_name - you need copy it to persistent location
 Windows is c:\buildartifacts

inputs.name: storageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Image builder will upload and download your build artifatcs from here and will set the appropriate permission. Storage account must exist.

inputs.name: distributeType
inputs.label: Distribute type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select distribute for Image Builder.
Supported distributes: Managed Image, Shared Image Gallery(gallery must exist before using it here) and VHD.

inputs.name: imageIdForDistribute
inputs.label: Image id for managed image
inputs.helpMarkDown: Image uri to store Managed Image.

inputs.name: galleryImageId
inputs.label: Image id for Shared Gallery Image
inputs.helpMarkDown: Image Uri to store Managed Image.

inputs.name: managedImageLocation
inputs.label: Location for managed image
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Location for managed image.

Example: westus, eastus, etc.

inputs.name: replicationRegions
inputs.label: Regions separated by comma
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Regions for Shared Gallery Images. It can be any Shared Image Gallery supported regions. Regions needs to be separated by comma.

Example: westus, westus2, eastus.

inputs.name: ibSubscription
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Azure Resource Manager subscription where image template will saved and run. This subscription should be enabled for image builder  before running this task.

inputs.name: ibAzureResourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource group to store Image Builder template.

inputs.name: ibLocation
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: This location is used to create resources needed to create image.
